name: user-service
description: User Service JS is a simple project to review my Full Stack experience in ReactJS and NodeJS, as well as get some hands-on experience in AWS Elastic Beanstalk.

scripts.start: npm -C backend run start-pm2 && npm -C frontend start
scripts.start-x: npm -C backend start | npm -C frontend start
scripts.preinstall: npm -C backend install && npm -C frontend install
